channel.title: How do I slow the speed of a crystal bow down?
channel.description:
hi all, I was just wondering how I slow the speed of c bows down, they are to fast, and they own, anyone got any advice?
James.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 27, 2007, 11:31:27 AM[/size][hr]it is impossible?

item.title: How do I slow the speed of a crystal bow down?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_u1 i_own__u
item.description:
@i_own_u1 wrote:

[quote=“musicmad441, post:1, topic:117364”]hi all, I was just wondering how I slow the speed of c bows down, they are to fast, and they own, anyone got any advice?

James.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 27, 2007, 11:31:27 AM[/size][hr]it is impossible?[/quote]
search for

playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4214))

under you will see pking delay change the numbers

Read full topic
